root.name: Bust-A-Move Pocket
root.description: Modes Main MenuPuzzle - The main mode of the Bust-a-Move series. You play through a series of levels trying to clear the board.Vs. CPU - You select a CPU opponent from a list of 8 characters. You compete to clear your board before the CPU opponent. The first player to win 2 rounds is the winner.Survivor - Survival mode is a never ending mode where you try to last as long as possible without failing. Game Options Game Level - Difficulty/speed. Vs. Round - How many rounds will be played against the CPU. Sound Test - Listen to the sounds from the game. Auto Poweroff - Decides whether or not to shut the power off after a set amount of time not playing. Data Clear - Will clear all the saved data on the game. Vs. CPU Opponents (From left to right, top to bottom) Vs. CPU Select Screen Willy WhistleSuper SocketBelugaBubble BusterCoileyHullaballoonStonerIncendo
